DOC.brief_summary: The investigators will study how well knee joint prostheses become fixed to the bone when patients get teriparatide, compared to placebo. Measurements will use high resolution 3D radiography (radiostereometry, RSA).
DOC.brief_title: Teriparatide for Improved Knee Prosthesis Fixation
DOC.criteria: Osteoarthritis of the knee planned for prosthesis surgery Poor health, drugs affecting bone metabolism.
